description: Your search for the BEST Phytoceramides is finally over!Does It Really Work?Ceramides are a lipid that naturally occurs in our skin when we're young. However, as we age our ceramide levels decrease and the skin's natural barrier begins to break down. The term 'Phyto' simply means "from a plant" so Phytoceramides are plant-based Ceramides. Ceramides have been in topical solutions for many years but only work on a superficial level. Oral Phytoceramide supplements work from the inside of the body out on a much deeper level.BenefitsPhytoceramides can help IMPROVE and OVERCOME many conditions including itchy skin, puffy eyes, long or fine lines, aging 'stretchy' wrinkles, uncomfortable swollen arms, ugly red marks, 'flaky' skin on legs, ankles and feet, 'old age' purple bruises, difficult oily/dry combination skin, embarrassing crows feet, turkey neck and sagging skin under the chin, unsightly split cuticles, fingertips and more...How Is Gina De Rossi's Premium Phytoceramides Different?It's manufactured in an FDA inspected & GMP certified facility. Each capsule is 100% natural and contains an ideal blend of 350 mg of plant based phytoceramides, 5000 IU of Vitamin A, 60 mg of Vitamin C, 400 IU of Vitamin D and 30 IU of Vitamin E.How Long Does It Take To Work?Some people see changes within 7-10 days. Others feel the full benefit after 3-4 weeks.You Have No Risk When You Purchase TodayYour purchase today includes Gina's 'Unique Promise'. If for ANY reason at any time you feel anything less than 100% delighted with your purchase, just let us know to receive a full 100% refund of your purchase!
title: Phytoceramides - The #1 'Fake a Facelift' Phenomenon As Seen on Tv's Dr Oz - 350mg of Wheat Based, Plant Derived Ceramides - A 100% Natural 'Better Than Botox' Skin Rejuvenation Supplement That Reduces Wrinkles & Fine Lines and Restores Hydration & Elasticity - 30 Day Supply - Includes Skin Protection Vitamins A, C, D and E - For Women and Men - 100% Lifetime Money Back Guarantee!
